entities.name: patronuses
entities.description: A type of spell that can be cast by wizards and witches, mentioned as something Harry and his friends will learn to do in the future.

relationships.description: Harry is looking forward to learning how to cast Patronuses, as mentioned by his friend when they return from the holidays.
